mapper.select: SELECT b.* FROM simulation_prediction b , ( SELECT DISTINCT DATE(a.prediction_time) prediction_time FROM simulation_prediction a WHERE WEEKDAY(a.prediction_time) = WEEKDAY(now()) ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1 ) c WHERE DATE(b.prediction_time) = DATE(c.prediction_time) AND TIME(b.prediction_time)>=TIME(now()) ORDER BY b.prediction_time LIMIT 12
